segments.text: Excellent . As soon as we landed , we boarded a bus to Disneyland . I love Mickey Mouse . Janet and I spent the entire first day going on all of the rides .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Didn't you feel any jet lag from the change in time zones ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I felt fine . I must have been too excited to notice .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've never been to Disneyland . I went to Universal Studios when I was fifteen . My parents took my brother Franco and I to Los Angeles and San Francisco.Wish you and Janet love each other more .
segments.speaker: S1
